name: Meteoroids (Cats4ever)
description:
Controls:

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Guide:

1. Shoot Incoming Meteors before they touch the pink line

2. Avoid Shooting Supply Drops

3. Shoot Pink Stars to earn points and a power-up

4. Survive the meteor shower and Earn as many points as possible

Meteoroids is a fast-paced arcade meteor defense blaster game where you try to protect your planet from and endless wave of incoming meteors for as long as possible. This game was made during the "Totally Totally Ranked Game Jam 2020”. Feel free to comment your thoughts about the game! Hope you enjoy :)

All Assets were made by me

Music - Made with Bandlab

SFX - Made with Sfxr

Art/Design -  Made Made with Pixilart

Programming - Made  with Gdevelop

Original OST can be downloaded below 

[You may use it as well for your own games as long as you credit me ;) ]
